attributes.action: understand that by his current actions he  could face impeachment for treason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In his actions, attitudes and speeches having regard to the ratification of the Lisbon treaty and in his refusal to allow the people of this Country the right to the promised referendum, Gordon Brown is committing treason in that he is defying the will of the People and of the Crown and ceding ultimate authority over Britain to a foreign nation.
Treason is, justifiably, punishable by death. In order that he does not incur this ultimate penalty, he should either resign  or return to the People their right for self-determination via the ballot box of a referendum.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
